segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the two children in the center of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite precariously balanced on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the 'COOKIE JAR,' what a determined little guy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, arm outstretched, patiently waiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've clearly got a plan, a secret operation underway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they think they're being incredibly stealthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how focused they are on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of their mischievous escapade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her own world, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies must be really good to risk climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s quite adorable to witness their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so concentrated, it's almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR
